statements: SELECT * FROM Referees;
SELECT name, certification FROM Referees;
SELECT referee_id, name, certification FROM Referees WHERE certification = 'Level 1';
SELECT * FROM Referees ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT name, match_assignment FROM Referees WHERE match_assignment IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM Referees WHERE certification = 'Advanced';
SELECT referee_id, name, certification FROM Referees WHERE match_assignment LIKE '%final%';
SELECT * FROM Referees WHERE name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT * FROM Referees ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT referee_id, name, certification FROM Referees WHERE certification IN ('Advanced', 'Intermediate') ORDER BY certification ASC, name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Referees;
SELECT id, name, certification FROM Referees WHERE certification='Level 2';
SELECT name, email FROM Referees WHERE id='123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM MatchAssignments WHERE match_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT referee_id, match_location FROM MatchAssignments ORDER BY match_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Referees WHERE certification = 'Advanced' ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT id, name FROM Referees WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT * FROM MatchAssignments WHERE match_date BETWEEN '2022-05-01' AND '2022-05-31';
SELECT referee_id, COUNT(match_date) AS total_matches FROM MatchAssignments GROUP BY referee_id ORDER BY total_matches DESC;
SELECT Referees.name, MatchAssignments.match_location FROM Referees INNER JOIN MatchAssignments ON Referees.id = MatchAssignments.referee_id WHERE MatchAssignments.match_location = 'Stadium A';
SELECT * FROM referees;
SELECT name, certification FROM referees ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT name FROM referees WHERE certification = 'FIFA Certified';
SELECT certification_name, organization FROM certifications ORDER BY organization DESC;
SELECT * FROM match_assignments WHERE referee_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM referees WHERE certification = 'Beginner' ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT name, certification FROM referees WHERE certification = 'Intermediate' ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT id, certification_name FROM certifications WHERE organization = 'FIFA' ORDER BY id;
SELECT referees.name, certifications.certification_name FROM referees JOIN certifications ON referees.certification = certifications.certification_name;
SELECT match_id, referee_id FROM match_assignments WHERE match_id = 123 ORDER BY referee_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM referees;
SELECT name, certification FROM referees WHERE id = 1;
SELECT certification_name, expiration_date FROM certifications WHERE expiration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, match_date, result FROM matches ORDER BY match_date DESC;

SELECT referees.name, certifications.certification_name, matches.result FROM referees INNER JOIN certifications ON referees.certification = certifications.id INNER JOIN assignments ON referees.id = assignments.referee_id INNER JOIN matches ON assignments.match_id = matches.id;
SELECT * FROM referees WHERE certification = 'Level 1';
SELECT name, certification FROM referees ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT matches.id, referee_id, match_date, result, name FROM matches JOIN referees ON matches.referee_id = referees.id;

SELECT certifications.certification_name, expiration_date, COUNT(*) as total_count FROM certifications JOIN assignments ON certifications.id = assignments.referee_id GROUP BY certifications.certification_name, expiration_date;
SELECT referees.name AS referee_name, COUNT(*) AS total_assignments FROM referees JOIN assignments ON referees.id = assignments.referee_id GROUP BY referees.name HAVING total_assignments > 2;
SELECT * FROM referees;
SELECT name, certification FROM referees WHERE certification='Level 1';
SELECT certification_name, valid_from, valid_to FROM certifications ORDER BY valid_from DESC;
SELECT * FROM matches WHERE location='Stadium A' ORDER BY match_date;
SELECT referee_id, email FROM referee_contacts WHERE referee_id='123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM referees ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT r.name, c.certification_name FROM referees r JOIN certifications c ON r.certification = c.id WHERE c.valid_to > '2023-01-01';
SELECT m.match_date, m.location, ra.assignment_date FROM matches m JOIN match_assignments ra ON m.id = ra.match_id ORDER BY ra.assignment_date ASC, m.location DESC;
SELECT rc.referee_id, rc.email, r.name FROM referee_contacts rc JOIN referees r ON rc.referee_id = r.id WHERE rc.phone_number LIKE '%123%';

SELECT r.name, c.certification_name, mc.match_date FROM referees r JOIN certifications c ON r.certification = c.id JOIN match_assignments ma ON r.id = ma.referee_id JOIN matches mc ON ma.match_id = mc.id WHERE mc.location = 'Stadium X';
